dxc.name: event.get
dxc.description: Grants the ability to retrieve events

dxc.name: case.append
dxc.description: Grants the ability to add new documents to the case

dxc.name: case.admin
dxc.description: Grants the ability to perform all operations on a case

dxc.name: participant.admin
dxc.description: Grants the ability to administer the participant

dxc.name: case.view
dxc.description: Grants the ability to view the case content

dxc.name: doc.all
dxc.description: Combines all document classification grants

dxc.name: event.consume
dxc.description: Combines events requires to get and acknowledge events

dxc.name: case.all
dxc.description: Combines all case grants

dxc.name: doc.reclassify
dxc.description: Grants the ability to reclassify the type of document

dxc.name: participant.all
dxc.description: Combines all participant grants

dxc.name: case.invite
dxc.description: Grants the ability to invite users to the case

dxc.name: case.state
dxc.description: Grants the ability to modify the state of the case

dxc.name: case.assign
dxc.description: Grants the ability to assign a new participant role

dxc.name: event.all
dxc.description: Combines all event grants

dxc.name: event.produce
dxc.description: Combines all grants required to produce events

dxc.name: case.identifiers
dxc.description: Grants the ability to add/edit public identifiers

dxc.name: case.comment
dxc.description: Grants the ability to comment on the case

dxc.name: case.transfer
dxc.description: Grants the ability to transfer the case to another participant

dxc.name: event.send
dxc.description: Grants the ability to send events

dxc.name: event.ack
dxc.description: Grants the ability to acknowledge events

passwordPolicy: hashIterations(20000) and length(8) and lowerCase(1) and upperCase(1) and specialChars(1) and notUsername(1) and passwordHistory(3) and digits(1)

authenticationFlows.description: Handle what to do if there is existing account with same email/username like authenticated identity provider
Used by Docker clients to authenticate against the IDP
Actions taken after first broker login with identity provider account, which is not yet linked to any Keycloak account
Username, password, otp and other auth forms.
Reset credentials for a user if they forgot their password or something
